sections.title: Totally Private
sections.content: WeekDeck works entirely in your browser and on your computer. No data is uploaded to any server - everything runs locally, ensuring your privacy and data security.

sections.title: How it works
sections.content: WeekDeck works locally in your browser, using the cache to save your week. If you want to save a file with your week, to use in other devices or to share it with others, you can do it by clicking - Save Week - in the top right corner. If you clean the cache of your browser, you will lose your week, so save it before cleaning it.

saveLoad.title: Your data is yours
saveLoad.description: You have complete control over your information in WeekDeck. Everything is stored locally on your device and you can use it anywhere you want. Your privacy, your rules.

sections.title: The project
sections.content: WeekDeck is a project by Roberto Nieto, a designer, illustrator, and art director with 20 years of experience in digital projects.

technicalInfo.title: Technical info
technicalInfo.description: Built with Bootstrap, Material Design Icons, Floating UI and Alpine.js.
